data.title: Tasty Burger
data.text: Still a fun place to take an 8 yr old. Eat with a crown on your head and the meal is even better. I love the way they cook the meats at BK.

data.title: Broiled burgers rock
data.text: So much better than a big mac. Great value combos. I love their french fries too. This place is great if you are in a hurry for good fast food.

data.title: One of the best places for hamburgers
data.text: In the fast food hamburger wars, Burger King beats the more famous place with Golden Arches, in my opinion. We are trying to cut down on calories a little so try to avoid the size upgrades.

data.title: The Burger Was COLD...TWICE!
data.text: Stopped for a double cheeseburger. Ordered it with fries and a coke. The order took over 7 minutes. The burger was so cold the cheese wasn't even melted. I took it back to the counter and asked for a hot burger. The counter person gave me an unfriendly scowl, tossed it in the wastebasket and hollered to someone in back that they needed a double cheese burger. Didn't apologize or say anything to ME. After waiting another 3 minutes, the counter person hollered out to the dining area, "double cheese burger!" I guess I thought the polite thing to do would be to bring it to my table, but I guess I was expecting too much. The second burger was just as cold, with no melted cheese. I was not about to go through all of that again. (I know, I should have). I gagged it down and left. Such poor service.

data.title: It's called Burger King for a reason; it's royalty.
data.text:
Wow. I felt like I died and went to Heaven- or, at least a country with a monarch.
Flame broiled beef? Sign me up. It's like the renaissance on steroids. So fast, hot and delicious. The veggies were crisp, something the golden arch could learn a thing or two about. 
Darn right I'll have it my way, I'm treated like the king when I walk into this joint.  
I give this place the highest ranking, besides knighting it, and labeling it a five-star dining establishment.
This isn't a take your wife on a hot date place. It's better. It's a place you go after you tell her you have to work late.  They have free wifi, a soda fountain, and views of Orem.
